{"step_by_step_thinking": "The apical constriction is defined as the narrowest area of the root canal, located near the apex of the tooth. According to Document [0], the mean distance of the apical constriction to the apical foramen (AC-AF) was 0.2 mm. This means that the apical constriction is located 0.2 mm coronal to the apical foramen.", "answer_choice": "A"}
